sentences.sentence: The deal will not be disadvantageous to your company.
sentences.translation: 这项交易不会对你公司不利。

sentences.sentence: The sale of part of the company could be disadvantageous to investors.
sentences.translation: 对公司局部的出售可能对投资人不利。

sentences.sentence: This is the disease prevention and early treatment is very disadvantageous.
sentences.translation: 这对本病的预防和早期治疗非常不利。
